channel.title: Games on ssamot's website
channel.description: Recent content in Games on ssamot's website

item.title: D&D/Warhammer 40K
item.description: Since I don’t get to play tabletop that much (or at all) these days, I substitute with Baldur’s Gate 3 and WH40K: Chaos Gate. Good enough, but obviously far away from the real thing…
